H0.text: In Kubrick's masterpiece 2001: A Space Odyssey, in a famous scene shift intended to show progress, a bone thrown in the air becomes what object. Space Station

H1.text: In Kubrick's masterpiece 2001: A Space Odyssey, in a famous scene shift intended to show progress, a bone thrown in the air becomes what object. Nuclear Bomb

H2.text: In Kubrick's masterpiece 2001: A Space Odyssey, in a famous scene shift intended to show progress, a bone thrown in the air becomes what object. Space Shuttle

H3.text: In Kubrick's masterpiece 2001: A Space Odyssey, in a famous scene shift intended to show progress, a bone thrown in the air becomes what object. Orbital satellite

A4.text: the film cuts to an orbiting satellite, marking the end of the prologue

A5.text: Robert Sawyer states that the bone is cut from a bone to a nuclear weapons platform
